title: make File->Export code  more versatile, no per-format slot

body:
By use QSignalMapper, there is no need anymore to have an
per-fileformat slot. 
The code might even become shorter now by utilizing existing 
fileformat tables.

One small comment, otherwise looks good.

Since we don't have automated GUI tests: Did you manually check that each format still works?

> One small comment, otherwise looks good.
> 
> Since we don't have automated GUI tests: Did you manually check that each format still works?

yes, i did :)
